# Extendicare Maintenance Inspection Checklist## Equipment: Sump Pump### LEGEND/KEY| LEGEND | KEY       |
|--------|-----------|
| W      | Weekly    |
| M      | Monthly   |
| Q      | Quarterly |
| S      | Semi-Annual |
| A      | Annual    |
| O      | Ok       |
| R      | Repair    |
| N      | Replace   |### CHECKS| W | M | Q | S | A | Item                                                   |
|---|---|---|---|---|--------------------------------------------------------|
| X |   |   |   |   | 1. Activate monthly (charge with water). |
| X |   |   |   |   | 2. Check exposed discharge piping for leaks. |
| X |   |   |   |   | 3. Check high-water-level alarm. |
| X |   |   |   |   | 4. Check that pit covers are in place and secure. |
|   | X |   |   |   | 5. Clean intake strainer.

|
|   | X |   |   |   | 5. Clean intake strainer. |### MONTHLY CHECKLIST|     | JAN |     | FEB |     | MAR |     | APR |     | MAY |     | JUN |     |
